channel.title: [Project Insanity]Need help with adding playersave Line!

item.title: [Project Insanity]Need help with adding playersave Line!
item.dc:creator: @taylor08 taylor08
item.description:
@taylor08 wrote:

[size=36pt]OMFG![/size]

Right i just figured out after all this time the most obvious thing EVER!

in the code:

characterfile.write("fightMode = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.fightMode), 0, Integer.toString(p.fightMode).length()); characterfile.newLine();

the “12” means how long it is including the spaces and “EQUALS” sign.

so in my part:

characterfile.write("inPriz = ", 0, #); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.inPriz), 0, Integer.toString(p.inPriz).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Where the “#” is there should be the number “9”

:o this took me 1 full day!!!

Read full topic
item.source: [Project Insanity]Need help with adding playersave Line!
